Infectum.text: Ap pallat da ilone kokәmdi/kokaymi bu saṯwo. Leaves become black in winter. (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.text:
lu ḥuldo grәšle u+šrulo, ŭ mi+šәmšo du+qayṭo kamәd ʕal ḥḏoḏe ‘Talpidae removed the melon's foliage, and it shriveled in the summer sun’ (Ilyas p.c.)
omar, ‘U+medawo, dlo elux xlәqlux, dlo+taʕibat ebe sәmlux, bnaqla dhawi ŭ hne, kamәd ʕal ḥḏode, komәqḥorat mine? he says, ‘That thing, that you did not create, on that you did not weary yourself, you did not do, that appeared in one moment and whatsited,  shriveled together, are you angry about it? (254 Jonah)

idioms: To become black and to wither, shrivel
